question: You are applying for a job. As well as attaching a CV, you need to write a cover letter explaining your reasons for choosing this particular job at this particular company, and why you would be a good hire. Things to include are:1. Possible qualifications or reasons for you to be hired2. Your energy and enthusiasm for the job3. Your past experience in a similar position.
text: I am writing this to express my interest in the career opening for a data engineer posted on Linkedin, dated 01/09/2022. I express my keen interest in this requirement due to my varied horizons.

Let me elaborate on my suitability for this  position. Firstly, I  graduated in computer science and engineering from Anna university, Chennai. Overall, I have around 10+ years of work experience and worked across multiple countries.

I am very much interested in this job as it is one of the biggest e-commerce platforms and it is the company that deals with the huge volume of data. It also lays the platform for the innovation to handle the data by providing  value to its customers.
My complete work experience is managing the data for one of the leading financial organizations. Hence, I found this job is more suitable for me considering my past experience.
I anticipate your response for further procedures.
